intro: Elsneria, commonly known as the silver leaf plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. It is native to various regions in the Americas, particularly in arid and semi-arid environments. The plant is characterized by its silvery-gray foliage, which is covered in fine, dense hairs. Elsneria species typically have small, daisy-like flowers that range in color from white to yellow. These plants are often cultivated as ornamental plants due to their unique appearance and drought tolerance.
